input.sentences: the crowd arrived to watch the fireworks display after dark .
everyone was so excited to celebrate the 4th of july .
then it was time to get the fireworks display started .
they had large red ones go off into the sky .
at the end of the show | they had blue and white fireworks .
output.sentences: My favorite thing to do on the 4th is to watch the fireworks display.
Every July I get excited and can't wait to celebrate with my friends.
Dark began closing in and the fireworks got started.
The sky lit up red and looks like its on fire.
Besides red there were also white and blue fireworks for the red, white and blue theme.
